Title: Simpallag Innondh Love Story
Writer: Pramod Ganesh (lyricist), Siddu Kodipura (lyricist), Suni (dialogue), Suni (lyricist), Suni (screenplay), Suni (story), Suni
Actors: Praveen Tej, Meghana Gaonkar, Master Hemanth, Kiran Vati
Plot: Simpallag Innondh Love Story is a film about two people who are different. On one hand, Khush is a happy-go-lucky guy, while Khushi is a girl who has big dreams for her life. They meet when Khushi is on her way back home.
